meanings.definition: Not able to be predicted or anticipated.
meanings.sent1: The outcome of the experiment was unforeseeable.
meanings.sent2: The weather in spring is often unforeseeable.
meanings.sent3: It was unforeseeable that the cat would start dancing.
meanings.sent4: The consequences of his actions were as unforeseeable as a hidden treasure.
meanings.sent5: The sudden change in plans was as unforeseeable as a shooting star.

meanings.sent1: The future is full of unforeseeable events.
meanings.sent2: The outcome of the game was completely unforeseeable.
meanings.sent3: It was unforeseeable that the cake would jump out of the oven.
meanings.sent4: The complexity of the situation made it as unforeseeable as a maze.
meanings.sent5: The twists in the plot made the movie as unforeseeable as a rollercoaster ride.
